projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: Clean, minimalist portfolio website showcasing creative work with interactive elements and smooth transitions.
projects.challenges: Balancing visual appeal with fast loading times and accessibility.

projects.title: SaaS Landing Page
projects.description: Modern, conversion-optimized landing page for SaaS products with animated sections and responsive design.
projects.challenges: Creating smooth animations while maintaining performance across all devices.

projects.title: Blog Template
projects.description: Feature-rich blog template with markdown support, search functionality, and social sharing capabilities.
projects.challenges: Implementing efficient search and content management system.

projects.title: E-Commerce Site
projects.description: Full-featured e-commerce platform with shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard.
projects.challenges: Implementing secure payment processing and inventory management.

projects.title: Cafe Website
projects.description: Elegant website for a local cafe with online menu, reservation system, and location information.
projects.challenges: Creating an appetizing visual design that loads quickly on mobile devices.

projects.title: Admin Dashboard
projects.description: Comprehensive admin dashboard with data visualization, user management, and real-time analytics.
projects.challenges: Handling large datasets efficiently while maintaining smooth user interactions.

projects.title: CV Maker
projects.description: A web application to help users create professional CVs and resumes.
projects.challenges: Generating PDF documents with consistent styling across different platforms.

projects.title: Learning App
projects.description: An online platform for learning new skills through courses and quizzes.
projects.challenges: Streaming video content efficiently and securing course materials.

projects.title: Landlord Rent Management System
projects.description: A system for landlords to manage properties, tenants, and rent payments.
projects.challenges: Ensuring data security and privacy for sensitive tenant information.

projects.title: Pharmacy Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive system for managing pharmacy operations, including inventory and sales.
projects.challenges: Complying with healthcare regulations and ensuring data accuracy.

projects.title: School Management System
projects.description: An all-in-one platform for managing school activities, students, and staff.
projects.challenges: Handling a large number of concurrent users and managing complex permissions.
